headline: In an Online Video, Kelly Goes Public About Ailes, Harassment, Fox News and ‘Bombshell’
abstract: The former Fox News anchor has mostly ignored the movie in which she is played by Charlize Theron — until now.
lead_paragraph: Megyn Kelly has kept her distance from “Bombshell,” a Hollywood awards contender that presents her as a key figure in exposing sexual harassment at Fox News. Until now.
